text: Vaisakha Rathiri is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jayadevan, starring Jeevan Prakash and Shanthi Krishna in the lead roles. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_vaisakha-rathiri-.htm ==Cast== * Jeevan Prakash * Shanthi Krishna ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Vaisakha Rathiri
